character.name: James

appearance.distinguishing_features: bright smile with slight dimples, small scar on left hand from kitchen knife accident

character.occupation: Culinary school student (mornings) and line cook at a Creole restaurant (evenings)
character.living_situation: Shared two-bedroom apartment with roommate Marcus (fellow culinary student) in a second-floor walkup in a colorful shotgun-style building in the Treme/Marigny neighborhood near the French Quarter, New Orleans, Louisiana
character.transportation: Single-speed bicycle with black frame; takes the streetcar when it rains

style.sleep: Gray sweatpants and a white tank top
style.culinary_school: White chef's coat (double-breasted), black-and-white checkered chef's pants, black non-slip kitchen shoes, white toque (chef's hat)
style.restaurant_work: Black chef's coat, black apron, black-and-white checkered chef's pants, black non-slip kitchen shoes
style.casual_commute: Jeans, graphic t-shirts (music or food themes), sneakers, sometimes a flat cap

notes.educational_context: This character represents a young African American culinary student pursuing his passion for cooking in New Orleans. The goal is consistency across all images so learners can follow the same person through their day.
